allow: Bash(cargo:*)
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=2 cargo test --features loom concurrent_segment_reserve_and_release -- --nocapture)
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=2 cargo test --features loom concurrent_insert_same_segment -- --nocapture)
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=2 RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test --features loom concurrent_insert_same_segment)
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=1 cargo test --features loom concurrent_item_append_to_segment -- --nocapture)
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=1 cargo test --features loom --lib)
Bash(for test in concurrent_segment_reserve_and_release concurrent_item_append_to_segment segment_full_tracking hashtable_unlink_concurrent)
Bash(do echo "=== Testing $test ===")
Bash(LOOM_MAX_PREEMPTIONS=1 timeout 10 cargo test --features loom $test)
Bash(done)
